methods.copy:
Create a copy of this SelectColumn.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.select.SourceColumn) an independent copy of this SelectColumn.
methods.disallowRefresh:
Should we disallow use of this column for refreshing tables?

 Some formulas can not be reliably computed with a refreshing table, therefore we will refuse to compute those
 values.

:return: boolean
methods.getColumnArrays:
Get a list of the names of column arrays used in this SelectColumn. Behavior is undefined if none of the init*
 methods have been called yet.

:return: (java.util.List<java.lang.String>) the list of column arrays used
methods.getColumns:
Get a list of the names of columns used in this SelectColumn. Behavior is undefined if none of the init* methods
 have been called yet.

:return: (java.util.List<java.lang.String>) the columns used in this SelectColumn
methods.getDataView:
Get a ColumnSource that can be used to access the data on demand.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.ColumnSource<?>) a ColumnSource
methods.getLazyView:
Returns a lazily computed view of this column.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.ColumnSource<?>) a lazily computed column source
methods.getMatchPair:
Get a MatchPair for this column, if applicable.

:return: io.deephaven.db.tables.select.MatchPair
methods.getName:
Get the name of the resultant column.

:return: (java.lang.String) the name of the column
methods.getReturnedType:
Get the data type stored in the resultant column.

:return: (java.lang.Class<?>) the type
methods.initDef:
Initialize any internal column definitions from the provided initial.

:param columnDefinitionMap: (java.util.Map<java.lang.String,io.deephaven.db.tables.ColumnDefinition<?>>) - the starting set of column definitions
:return: (java.util.List<java.lang.String>) a list of columns on which the result of this is dependent
methods.initInputs:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**

Initialize the SelectColumn using the input table and return a list of underlying columns that this SelectColumn
 is dependent upon.

*Overload 1*  
  :param table: (io.deephaven.db.tables.Table) - the table to initialize internals from
  :return: (java.util.List<java.lang.String>) a list containing all columns from 'table' that the result depends on
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param index: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - the base index
  :param columnsOfInterest: (java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extendsio.deephaven.db.v2.sources.ColumnSource<?>>) - the input columns
  :return: (java.util.List<java.lang.String>) a list of columns on which the result of this is dependent
methods.newDestInstance:
Create a new WritableSource with sufficient capacity for the rows in the index.

:param size: (long) - The number of rows to allocate
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.WritableSource<?>) a new WritableSource with sufficient capacity for 'dataSubset'
